subject: Football (College)
Radio
lead_paragraph: Brandon Gaudin, 29, was chosen from among more than 150 applicants to be Georgia Tech’s radio play-by-play announcer, a job that goes far beyond broadcasting games.
snippet: Brandon Gaudin, 29, was chosen from among more than 150 applicants to be Georgia Tech’s radio play-by-play announcer, a job that goes far beyond broadcasting games.
